website_summaries.verdict: This versatile set of figurines is ideal for younger viewers of the Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood successor series.
pros: Figures are 2.5 inches tall, with pose-able arms and movable heads
Complete set of characters, including exclusive Pandy
Promotes creative play for a single child or a group
cons: Individual pieces are lightweight, may not stand upright

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. I expected more with the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this 2 stars instead of 1 is because my daughter loves them. They are light-weight and in no way heavy duty. Daddy Tiger's head was not properly attached to his body so he has a giraffe like neck. The paint job on these is below a sub par level. Looks as though I let my daughter paint them herself. I honestly expected more out of this product for the price. If my review is hard to understand....... Go to the dollar store and pick up one of their barbie dolls they have..... These are the same quality. DISAPPOINTING. I do not anticipate they will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute toys but 2 were defective!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter a few months ago and waited until a special occasion milestone was reached to give it to her. She loved Daniel Tiger so much so I knew this would be the perfect gift. She's 2 years old so she doesn't really care but we noticed this morning that Katerina has two right arms! As another reviewer mentioned, Prince Wednesday doesn't stand upright because his shoes aren't flat. Other than these 2 manufacturing defects, she loves them, but as the purchaser, the product quality is subpar!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Masey91

customer_reviews.title: Too small, quality not great
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but I feel like half their heads are going to fall off. Particularly, miss elayna’s and prince Wednesday’s. These are meant for small children so I expected them to be better quality. They are also small enough that tigey and pandy can fit in a kid’s mouth easily and some of the other characters can too. My kids love them but I don’t let them play with them unless I am watching because they are just not really safe for small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Best Daniel Tiger set!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's favorite 4th birthday present! She loves Daniel Tiger! This is played with daily and goes everywhere with us. She has to tell everyone about her tigers, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kymber

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these little figures from Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood. She loves to play with them and when she is watching Daniel, she loves to get them out. A great gift for children. I also bought her the Daniel Tiger cloth lunch box to put them in. The lunch box with the trolley and Daniel and his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Bosse

customer_reviews.title: Great! But I don't like Mom Tigers neck.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to decorate the top of my daughter's birthday cake. My only complaint is Mom Tigers head has a long neck that makes her head twist all the way around all the time. No other figures have a loose long neck like her or really a neck period. And her head is enormous compared to Dad Tiger which makes no sense. Also the paint seems to wear off rather easily from playing but I don't have super high expectations for painted plastic. Bonus: I bought a dollhouse for my daughter and was going to buy special dolls for it but she's been playing with the whole neighborhood in the house so it worked out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I’m really surprised at the good reviews for this product because I was really disappointed. They are made from a super hard hollow plastic and you can tell just by looking at them that there will be broken arms all over the place in a matter of days. They seem like a dollar store toy. The packaging was plastic that was so tightly wrapped around the figures I had to try and cut them out with scissors and then had really sharp plastic that could seriously slice up a hand. Basically this seems like the cheapest of Chinese made products and I’m really surprised it’s sold by amazon and not a third party seller.
customer_reviews.author: birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Great toy set for toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is one of very few toy figurine sets that features an entire family. My toddler is completely obsessed with it and takes the whole set everywhere. The show itself is just phenomenal, I love that the set has the entire tiger family and Daniel's friends and kiddo just can't get enough of it.. The pieces are molded well with no holes/gaps that I can see. It's taken quite a few dips in the bath and pool and I've not see any water caught within the pieces, so no need to worry about mold from water trapped inside.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Cute but don’t stand
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but big flaw- they don’t stand up well on their own. They tip over easily on hard surfaces and won’t stand on carpet. My two year old granddaughter loved them at first because they are Daniel Tiger but lost interest quickly when she couldn’t make them stand to play with them. I was hoping she’d be able to actually play with them in her doll house but they sit in a container instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mac's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Three Months Later (review)...
customer_reviews.text: We've had these figurines for about 3 months now, and they have survived our three year old's constant playing! Well constructed and perfect for tiny hands...they've been the center of hours and hours of pretend play. Our LO loves to travel with them - perfect for car seat play! And they're small enough to fit inside most toy cars/dollhouses/etc. Mom Tiger's face has faded just a tad, but this doesn't stop our LO from loving her! Any Daniel Tiger little one would be happy to have these figurines!
customer_reviews.author: VintageFOTO

customer_reviews.title: Ugga Mugga Daniel Tiger!
customer_reviews.text: We love Daniel Tiger!! My son is now at the age where he loves his little people to hold in his hands. When I was looking for new figurines I came across these...I am in love. They are exact replica to the cartoon. I feel bad for the consumers who had defects or though they were of poor quality. I am very impressed and every figurine is in perfect condition. His faves are Tigey and Pandy. Soooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap hard plastic feel
customer_reviews.text: I really expected my toddler to love these, but so far, he's not so interested. They are made of a harder (more brittle) plastic than I was expecting; I figured they'd be more rubberized. The arms move but are stiff. One of ours (Pandy, I think) has something broken off inside him so he rattles. Just a little disappointed with the quality. They don't feel very durable. I love having so many of the characters available as a set, though.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCardwell

customer_reviews.title: Cute figurines, need some structural changes
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and I love that there is a pandy and tigey. Overall the quality is fairly good,but as some reviews have noted they are not all easy to stand up. Prince Wednesday seems to have the most difficulty and some of the other characters require a delicate touch, which for a toddler is a no go. We also have the trolley and while these do fit in th trolley, again you have to place them just right to get them to stand correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. But seem like cheap quality for the price. I was expecting them to be a little thicker plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Margy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but inconsistent features and not super durable
customer_reviews.text: Some of the character's arms and/or heads move, and some don't, and its not easy to tell by looking. This confusion led to Daniel Tiger's arm getting broken off in an effort to twist his arm at the shoulder seam (it appeared that his arm, like the others, was posable, but you could see after the fact that it is not).
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Packed too tight, plastic too brittle but overall good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Toys feel pretty cheap... not terrible but not great. Would have liked it if they moved their appendages more. Some like Owl don't move at all and just feel like a plastic shell. The packaging was absolutely horrendous. Trying to pry those little pieces of brittle plastic from a similarly brittle plastic which was shrink-wrapped too tight was impossible. I resorted to cutting the plastic around them which risked damaging the toys. I am not a weak man, either. Kids absolutely love them, though! Waiting for Owl's feet to break off but I would recommend this regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Por

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed
customer_reviews.text: For being so small they are very detailed. They fit perfectly in the electronic trolley. My two year likes to spin their heads around which makes me worry that one day they might break off but so far so good. Their little arms move, but I kind of feel like that is almost an unnecessary feature because the arms are so tiny. I loved this pack that has all of the characters in one package it was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: JKDar

customer_reviews.title: Who could resist these?
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect! Other than Prince Wednesday having trouble standing (which is just too perfect if you ask me), my daughter is obsessed with these. O the Owl is the coolest figure in my opinion, but they all look great. I roll one of these out every now and then instead of giving her all at once, and for the price, it's working out quite well.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.  Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The characters included in this amazon multi pack of Daniel tiger far exceed those available from other stores. In this you get his whole family and his best buddies. The toys are a rubbery plastic that fit into the Daniel tiger trolley like a charm...a few of the smaller characters are a harder plastic like the owl. My 14 month old would give it 2 thumbs up... or a high five.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Two left hands
customer_reviews.text: They're a little smaller than I'd have liked - Daniel Tiger is a preschool show after all, and the smaller ones pose a choking hazard. Quality seems fine when they're not defective. But in our set Mom Tiger has two left hands. Disappointing at the high price point that they are.
customer_reviews.author: Agata Bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: The Daniel Tiger Family is perfect for your family too!
customer_reviews.text: This set is the perfect size for little hands. My children LOVE the Daniel Tiger show, and this package has all the favorite characters for them to act out the episodes or make up their own stories. I had originally thought that they would be made out of a squeezable silicone plastic. But upon opening the box, realized that they were a hollow hard plastic. It didn’t make much of a difference to me or my toddler who received them. But it does mean that I keep them away from my 4 year old that has a tendency to make his toys “fly” across rooms.
customer_reviews.author: momma_3boys1girl

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my 4 year old daughter and was pleasantly surprised at how well made they are These are solid, sturdy and do not break easily. Not flimsy at all. A perfect size for small hands and very well made. They look just like the characters from the show. She has lots of fun playing pretend with these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: nice set for a a child who loves Daniel Tiger.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set my daughter will love them. The nose on the mother tiger looks scuffed a little. Smaller that I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Daniel tiger tiny fan - GREAT buy - GIFTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Moveable - kid friendly - durable ! My 2 yr old loved these and they seem to be made well and will last . The arms and head can be moved around - hand size perfect for toddlers - little kids ! I love that this is the whole character line up in one pack ! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I paired these with the Calico Critters treehouse, since I wasn't really happy with daniel tiger houses/playsets. It worked out perfectly, and my 3yo toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Daniel Tiger figurea
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my sons second birthday cake. Knowing he would definitely play with they after the party also. He has not stopped carrying around the little Daniel since! Great little figures! We added them to our dollhouse & they are played with often!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sackett

customer_reviews.title: Great set but poor quality paint
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set but after only a month of play that paint is coming off all the figures to the point where my 3yo asks why Mom Tiger has a mustache now. Also Prince Wednesday is very top heavy and hard to keep standing up.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S

customer_reviews.title: Grr-ific!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! My daughter could not have been more excited with all of these figurines! I was hesitant due to some previous reviews, but Katarina’s arms were correct, and Mom Tiger’s head isn’t really that big...
customer_reviews.author: Julie M

customer_reviews.title: Five star toy!
customer_reviews.text: This set includes more figures for less money than others we found online. It is a very cute and sturdy playset. Little ones who love Daniel tiger will be very excited to receive this as a gift. It also has "staying, playing power". Our 3 year old comes back to it almost daily for pretend play. Fits easily into little hands and bags for trips to the park, etc. Not too small to be a choking hazard. Five stars from us!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Rock-solid toys perfect for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these toys. She played with them all night, even brought them into bed to sleep with! She loves Daniel Tiger. They are a solid plastic that is easy to clean/dry off with a towel. They are also small enough to fit into most of her toys we already have.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolee

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I got them for my 2yo daughter at Christmas as she loves Daniel Tiger. She gets lots of play out of them. They ride the cars we have, they go on picnics, to the library, and more all while at home. They’ve been a great addition to the doll house we have too.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids that like Daniel Tiger
customer_reviews.text: These little figures were a huge hit on Christmas morning. They've only been in use for a few days, but so far seem sturdy, and are a good proportion for my daughter to play with them without being a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hartsig

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves playing with these, however the quality of the product is poor. Thin, cheap plastic, not at all like the Fisher Price Little People quality. I hope these last for years, cause he plays rough with his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Donkey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2 year old grandson. They are very cheaply made. They are more of the quality of McDonald’s happy meal toys. I really expected more for the price. I would not recommend this product. Go to McDonald’s and you will at least get some food to go along with your cheap toy.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great figurines. Hard to get out of the package. My son was thrilled to receive these as a birthday present. Pretty good quality. The only issue we had is O the Owl doesn’t sit right in the Trolley like the other characters do.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Loves playing with Daniel and friends.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a little three year old because I had bought the stuffed one for my greatgranddayghter. She loves all her Daniel Tiger figures and plays with them all the time. Just loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Powell

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for Older than 3+ yrs....
customer_reviews.text: Cute and well-made. Only thing I would note is that these are not single pieces (like FP Little people). Most characters have articulating head & arms. Definitely not for younger children. Info. reads 3+ but I'd have liked to know they are multi-pieces.
customer_reviews.author: MissKrissy

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like what’s pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this Daniel Tiger character set for my oldest daughter, who is almost 3, for Christmas this year. Everything looks exactly as pictured. They look so cute and durable. I know my daughter will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lalanie22

customer_reviews.title: Just as You Expect
customer_reviews.text: Great set of little Daniel Tiger figures. They fit in the large Trolley set that comes with Safety Daniel and Mom Tiger, which is perfect because we bought the set to replace our lost Mom Tiger figure
customer_reviews.author: Katie Payne

customer_reviews.title: My two year old loves these
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. My son loves Daniel tiger, knows all the names. I also bought him the trolley and you can get 4 of these in there.
customer_reviews.author: MRSCMLV

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loved them!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old LOVED them for her birthday! Perfect size! The box came nice looking and they were well secured in it. All the characters looked very nice with not blemishes. Would definitely recommend for the price for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for our 3 year old to hold onto ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set to our kids for Christmas. They are small, about 2 inch tall plastic figurines. The parents are little taller. Perfect size for our 3 year old to hold onto the figurines. Nice quality, after 1 month. We will see how the colors and shape keeps up with time. This absolut plus is that this set has the whole tiger family and the friends as well.
customer_reviews.author: AnneM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good toys
customer_reviews.text: These are a little cheaply made, but the kids don't care. They love them! I don't let them get wet because there's little spots that the water can get inside and they are hollow. The kids have not broken them yet and it's been three months of use! I would definitely recommend for your Daniel Tiger lover.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Characters fit in the Trolley
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughters 2nd birthday party. She loves playing with Daniel and his friends. (Side note- I did purchase the trolley separately which comes with a Daniel but these characters do fit in the trolley.) The pieces are small so be careful with your toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: PB's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: This set is by far the best value for all the characters from Daniel Tiger, my two year old LOVES that show and I had been wanting to buy her some toys from it, but even at walmart I could only find a set of 5 characters for 10.99 After price comparing all the stores around me to Amazon, I found this to be the best deal by far. The toys are sturdy and hold up to my two year olds rough playing, highly recommend these to anyone looking for Daniel Tiger toys and who also loves saving money
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: We gifted these to her for Christmas and she seems very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves Daniel Tiger. We gifted these to her for Christmas and she seems very pleased with them. All the characters look like they should per the show. All have movable arms and heads except Tigey and Pandy. And they all have a little hole in their feet so that they can ride in Trolley (sold seperately, also adorable, it even dings)
customer_reviews.author: Ariel B.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Daniel Tiger lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves Daniel Tiger. This is a great set with the most popular characters at a great price. She loves them and tries to carry all 8 around at the same time on her tiny hands.
customer_reviews.author: AlexsMom93993

customer_reviews.title: very cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: love these characters. My19 month old loves the Daniel Tiger TV program so I bought these characters for him to play with. He absolutely loves these especially Mama Tiger, Daddy Tiger, Margaret and Daniel Tiger. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Noel 61

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy figures. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are a very solid plastic, and the paint and design details look great. My toddler loves them and plays with them often. Only complaint is that a few of them are difficult to stand up... even for grownups.
customer_reviews.author: BR from AR

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I was expecting something sturdier for the price. Gave it a couple stars because at least my set didn't have any paint issues (still holding after a month), and my niece did like the set.
customer_reviews.author: ACN

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with the toddler. Some pieces might be a choking hazard for littles.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these. She's obsessed with DT, and it's fun to watch her practice imaginative play. The Pandy and Tigey figures are possible choking hazards for my 1-year-old, though (she once swallowed a whole strawberry, because she's kind of a brute), and those figures are comparable to the size of a small strawberry.
customer_reviews.author: JRussell

customer_reviews.title: Quality and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love them more then expected. Even though they are little they still made their arms and head move! Durable and colorful. Perfect for little imaginations
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: One of the characters does not stand up. :(
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old absolutely loves these figurines. My reason for 4 stars...our “Prince Wednesday” figurine has never been able to stand up...something in the manufacturing or maybe just a random defect. But she has 9 adorable figurines in a row and he just has to lay there...poor Prince Wednesday
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Daniel Tiger Fans!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is a HUGE Daniel Tiger fan and she LOVES these! Perfect size for little hands, but not too small to be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Love these! High quality & cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old plays with these every day. They are good quality & none have fallen apart. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Toys for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: These figurines are the PERFECT size for little hands. My 2 year old just LOVES them and LOVES to carry them around. She moves their heads and arms around too. I would have loved to give a 5 star, but the paint on the hard plastic figures (O the Owl, Tiger and Pandy) has worn off very quickly, so I feel that could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: The Taylors

customer_reviews.title: Tigey is here!
customer_reviews.text: Basically, I do like these. The littles who visit love them. They will last a long time. They do not have many movable parts so arms can be problematic.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have been happier with these. They are the perfect size to play with & the arms & such even move. Only complaint is the packaging. While the display is nice, it can be a pain to get them out initially.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great item, fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Great item that my grandson has and now I have one too in my house for him to play with when he visits. Bought the extra character figures to add to both! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Sobel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like good quality characters. But my little granddaughter already had received two sets for Christmas. So I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: We have fun playing with it , but wish they could sit, and could you add more of the characters, music man Stan, King Friday, prince Wednesday, Queen sarah Saturday, baker acre, and more of the friends .
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new little neighbors!
customer_reviews.text: Cool little gift set featuring most of the prominent characters on Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood. My son is a huge fan and loves these little guys!
customer_reviews.author: Britnylove13

customer_reviews.title: Looooooove them!
customer_reviews.text: My two sons (almost 3 and almost 2) live these and have playing with them since Santa brought them to our home! Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler fan of the TV show
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them. The characters look like they do on the show and they are durable thru all the things my toddler puts them thru.
customer_reviews.author: Banny

customer_reviews.title: Very Loved!
customer_reviews.text: By far my daughters favorite Christmas gift. I took the wooden people out of her doll house and surprised her with these. She plays with them every single day and her imaginary play has skyrocketed since getting these figureines.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toys, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my granddaughter who loves Daniel Tiger. She was thrilled and plays with them every day. The figures go nicely with the other playsets and seem well made and durable. Amazon's price was much lower than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: HandymanG

customer_reviews.title: Great! Some very slight imperfections with the paint
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My only complaint is some very minor imperfections with the paint, but certainly nothing my 3 year old will notice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Having the complete set of characters, and they fit in the separately sold trolley
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 1 year old granddaughter to use with the trolley I got her. She adores having all her Daniel Tiger friends to put in her trolley.
customer_reviews.author: patti lee

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son is OBSESSED. We got these for his 3rd birthday and he loves them so much. They are actually really strong and sturdy quality, which is great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: EvaHearts612

customer_reviews.title: If you're a Daniel Tiger fan, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are obsessed with these characters. I had to buy multiple ones so that each of them has them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this gift.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set. Our grandson knew all the characters (he is 2 1/2 years old). These are never going to wear out. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: The characters look just like how they are on tv
customer_reviews.text: My 2year old is a huge Daniel fan! I bought this along with the trolley. The characters look just like how they are on tv. My only complaint about this is Prince Wednesday doesn't stand very well - his feet aren't leveled so it's almost impossible to get him to stand. All the other characters don't have much of that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Present- loved it - when received and going strong in toddler play times. Fast delivery and service
customer_reviews.author: D. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughters 2 and 6 both love these. The arms move and they are cute. Great for Daniel tiger fans
customer_reviews.author: ToriGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Daniel Tiger family :)
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement for lost fisher price doll house little people. My grand daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my granddaughters for Christmas they love to watch and play whit these toys.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for imaginative play.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to Daniele the Tiger's Trolley. Great for imaginative play. Good size, not too small or too big.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these little toys! They look just like the characters, and seem durable. I love how it Included all the characters too!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Cassador

customer_reviews.title: well worth getting
customer_reviews.text: the item is great and for fans of the Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood shows, it is worth getting. I wish they would add some of the other adult characters too. I would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Daniel Tiger
customer_reviews.text: I think all will be fine as I can't open it up because it's for my grandson as a Christmas present Quick delivery ....., when you say 2 days delivery with having Amazon Prime you mean it . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tartan splash

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute, and they fit perfectly in the trolly that is sold separately. I paid for fast shipping as a last minute gift and they delivered it faster then expected!!! Love love love this product and can’t say enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Derosier

customer_reviews.title: Cute and little.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little toys. Fun to play with and our little loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Betta

customer_reviews.title: Cute Characters
customer_reviews.text: A good number of familiar characters. I would have liked the names for each one in the box. Use your imagination to play out different scenes. We made a Trolly out of an egg carton and popsicle sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift for Daniel Tiger Fans
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves Daniel Tiger and he was delighted to earn each character. There are some moving parts, but mostly they are solid, light weight, hard plastic. Safe for our little toddler. Fabulous value. If your child loves Daniel Tiger, you will win points with these gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away on the quality of these toys! I bought them thinking they would be made cheap, but it shocked me how big and thick the actually are!! Can not wait to give them as Christmas gifts to my kids the absolutely love Daniel Tiger! Great price for the number of figuers you get and for the amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Grr-ific
customer_reviews.text: My Little one loves them. Got them for her birthday because she's big Daniel Tiger fan. They are a good size, easy to clean if needed, and my little girl loves them.
customer_reviews.author: O. mills

customer_reviews.title: Daniel and the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: If your little ones are fans of Daniel Tiger then they'll love these adorable figures. Both my two year old and my 7 month old adore these.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: These are super adorable and easy for my kid to play with. They are not too small and they make great bath toys too! My kids bring them wherever we go and they love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like advertised
customer_reviews.text: The Daniel Tiger's neighborhood characters are made to last and look just like the tv characters.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great action figures for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my son because he loves Daniel Tiger. They’re great little action figures for him to play with! We even used them as decor for his birthday party!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Daniel Tiger is great
customer_reviews.text: My little grandson loves to watch Daniel Tiger and will be excited to get this set of his family and friends. Will save for Christmas or his birthday in January.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old delight
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves playing with these. They're just the right size for little hands. Would be a chocking hazard for a younger child.
customer_reviews.author: OldMommy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: I nearly had an aneurysm trying to pry them out of the plastic but my little ones loved them. They are on the small size and a bit overpriced but overall a good toy.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable, well made , granddaughter is 3 and loves them. I would definitely recommend to anyone who has a little 1 that loves Daniel Tiger show !! Or loves animals.
customer_reviews.author: NanaJis reading

customer_reviews.title: A toddler favorite
customer_reviews.text: I used these in a advent calendar for my toddler. They were a hit! I loved that the set included all the main characters.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quality and quantity
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 1 day earlier than expected. My 5yo son is very happy with the figures. They are bright, colorful, and the arms move on some of the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Ellen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Daniel Tiger is the best!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVED these!!!! They have really held up so well over the last few months and she loves playing with them! They’re the perfect size to work with all of her little people and Peppa figures, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Daniel Tiger lover in your life
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old LOVES Daniel Tiger and plays with these daily. They fit in her Calico Critters house and Little People playsets and have been a great addition to her toy collection.
customer_reviews.author: MegSimm

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them. Just wish they included other Charters. Kids asked for Jodi and the other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy,  but find another buyer
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is nice and durable. But it looked as if the one I received was a return. The figures were nestled into the plastic but the cardboard it’s usually secured and sold in was all beat up and taped together.
customer_reviews.author: MRey

product_meta.title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood Friends & Family Figure Set (10 Pack) Includes: Daniel, Friends, Dad & Mom Tiger, Tigey & Exclusive Figure Pandy
product_meta.description: It's a beautiful day in the neighborhood because all your friends and family are here to play! Mom and dad Tiger along with baby Margaret, O the owl, Prince Wednesday, miss Elaina, Katerina, Tiger and Pandy are all ready to go on tiger-tastic adventures with Daniel Tiger! Their poseable arms and moving heads make playtime so imaginative, encouraging realistic role-play anytime, anywhere. Approximately 2.5", just right for pocket-sized play. Full set of collectible neighborhood friends! Designed for ages 3+.
feature_bullets: Approximately 2.5 inches, just right for pocket sized play
Encourages realistic role play anytime, anywhere
Full set of collectible neighborhood friends
